rule-21-7-a.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  Baseline ruleset project description utilizes system 7 with supply and return temperatures correctly set to 180 F and 130 F respectively. Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), the hot water supply temperature (HWST) shall be 180F, and the hot water return temperature (HSRT) shall be 130F
